Uses of Package
com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer

  • Packages that use com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.limiters  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.proximities  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.utils.rays  
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer 
    Class and Description
    Limiter
    A Limiter provides the maximum magnitudes of speed and acceleration for both linear and angular components.
    Proximity
    A Proximity defines an area that is used by group behaviors to find and process the owner's neighbors.
    Proximity.ProximityCallback
    The callback object used by a proximity to report the owner's neighbor.
    Steerable
    A Steerable is a Location that gives access to the character's data required by steering system.
    SteeringAcceleration
    SteeringAcceleration is a movement requested by the steering system.
    SteeringBehavior
    A SteeringBehavior calculates the linear and/or angular accelerations to be applied to its owner.
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.behaviors 
    Class and Description
    GroupBehavior
    GroupBehavior is the base class for the steering behaviors that take into consideration the agents in the game world that are within the immediate area of the owner.
    Limiter
    A Limiter provides the maximum magnitudes of speed and acceleration for both linear and angular components.
    Proximity
    A Proximity defines an area that is used by group behaviors to find and process the owner's neighbors.
    Proximity.ProximityCallback
    The callback object used by a proximity to report the owner's neighbor.
    Steerable
    A Steerable is a Location that gives access to the character's data required by steering system.
    SteeringAcceleration
    SteeringAcceleration is a movement requested by the steering system.
    SteeringBehavior
    A SteeringBehavior calculates the linear and/or angular accelerations to be applied to its owner.
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.limiters 
    Class and Description
    Limiter
    A Limiter provides the maximum magnitudes of speed and acceleration for both linear and angular components.
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.proximities 
    Class and Description
